text: Sphingomonas naasensis is a Gram-negative, aerobic and rod-shaped bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas with a polar flagellum which has been isolated from forest soil on the Baengnyeong Island in Korea.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas naasensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase naasensis Category:Bacteria described in 2014
title: Sphingomonas naasensis
